entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a student who was in Professor Trelawney's classes. He is described as 'the Object' of her predictions, indicating that he has been the subject of her divinations.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a teacher who specializes in divination. She is described as having made predictions about Harry Potter, and she seems to have a fondness for him.

entities.name: the nag
entities.description: The Nag is mentioned as a centaur who knows nothing of cartomancy. It is described as finding Professor Trelawney's questions comical.

entities.name: the centaur
entities.description: The Centaur is another name for the Nag, and it is mentioned in a similar context. It is described as not knowing anything about cartomancy.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney has made predictions about Harry Potter, indicating that she is the one who has predicted his future.
Harry Potter is described as 'the Object' of Professor Trelawney's predictions, indicating that he has been the subject of her divinations.
Professor Trelawney asked the Nag/Centaur if it had sensed any coming catastrophe, indicating that she is seeking information from this entity.
